Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; Item&#160;2.02 Results of Operations and Financial Condition. &nbsp; On July 24, 2019, Tesla, Inc. released its financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2019 by posting its Second Quarter 2019 Update letter on its website. The full text of the letter is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1 and is incorporated herein by reference. &nbsp; This information is intended to be furnished under Item 2.02 of Form 8-K, &#8220;Results of Operations and Financial Condition&#8221; and shall not be deemed &#8220;filed&#8221; for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended (the &#8220;Exchange Act&#8221;), or incorporated by reference in any filing under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such a filing &#160; &nbsp; Item&#160;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. &#160; (d) Exhibits. &#160; Exhibit&#160;No. &nbsp; Description &nbsp; &nbsp; 99.1 &nbsp; Tesla, Inc. Second Quarter 2019 Update Letter, dated July 24, 2019. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned hereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; &#160; TESLA, INC. &nbsp; &nbsp; By: &#160; /s/ Zachary J. Kirkhorn &nbsp; &#160; Zachary J. Kirkhorn Chief Financial Officer Date: July 24, 2019 &nbsp; &nbsp;
